price: ߣߌ߫ ߒ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߟߊ߫ ߣߍߡߊ ߕߍ߫ ߒ ߕߎ߲߬ ߘߌ߫ ߞߍ߫ ߟߣߊ߬ߓߊ߰ߕߐ ߟߎ߬ ߘߏ߫ ߘߌ߫ ( ߡߍ߲ߜߏߦߊ߫ ) ߟߋ߬ ߘߍ߯
arabic: وَلَوۡلَا نِعۡمَةُ رَبِّي لَكُنتُ مِنَ ٱلۡمُحۡضَرِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: walawlā niʿ'matu rabbī lakuntu mina al-muḥ'ḍarīna
